name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, did you enjoy yourselves?
Since you're all here, I guess it's safe to assume you did.

name: Korpokkur
text:
That makes me happy, too.
You want to keep having fun like this, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
...?
Ah, no, no, that's not what I meant.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I know you'd answer that way
when it's about yourself, little hero.

name: Korpokkur
text:
What if someone else told you "there's no future for you"...
That's the real question.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Now, we will begin this winter's special
Snowland Santa Departure Ceremony!

Amidst thunderous applause, Santa School students,
now acting as amusement park cast, lined up in the plaza.

The cheers from the children for the cast of
their favorite attractions did not cease.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, thank you for willingly accepting and cooperating with my proposal,
even though I have only been at Santa School for a short time.

name: Snegurochka
text:
As a magical girl, I can give dreams,
and as a member of Santa, I can carry out activities—

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thanks to you, I was able to fulfill both.
Thank you so, so much.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, was this
year's Christmas fun—!?

name: Everyone
text: It was fun—!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, that makes me so happy.
Alright, Santas, it's finally time to begin the departure ceremony!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Make-up Snow Maiden!!
Let's go, Santas!

With Hastur's spatial leap, their clothes were blown away,
and the Santa School students transformed into their formal attire by something like magic.

name: Ded
text:
My students, Snegurochka worked so hard for us.
Now it's our turn to show them what we can do, isn't it?

name: Yule
text:
Yes, Ded-sensei!
Santa Clauses, departing!!

The Santas, who had transformed into their Santa costumes,
rode their sleds and flew into the sky.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Grandpa, everyone, do your best!
May many children's faces be filled with smiles!

And [Player] and the others also
transformed into Santa Claus.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Now, for the climax of the departure ceremony!
Are you ready for the all-cast show parade coming your way~?
Battle? Start

name: Korpokkur
text:
Now, my cute children.
The Santa of your paradise is me, Korpokkur!

name: Korpokkur
text:
You want this bag full of snacks
that the cooking team has prepared, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're a hopeless one, [Player].
Well, if there are any leftovers, I'll give them to you.

options.text: The fluffy Santa outfit is so cute~!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even if you flatter me, I'm not giving you presents, just so you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even if you flatter me, I'm not giving you presents, just so you know?

name: Hastur
text:
I will give you a present.
I'm in a very good mood tonight, so you don't need to pay me back~?

name: Hastur
text:
If you're so bothered by it,
a gift exchange is also fine.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You yourself have the most excellent thing right here.
Haha, don't pretend you don't know.

options.text: A gift exchange, that's a great idea!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm a little curious about what you'll offer me.
I won't forgive you if it's something tasteless, though?

options.text: The suit-like Santa outfit looks so cool!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
Someone of my caliber can even pull off a crimson outfit.

name: Yoshito
text:
I also have a present for you, Master.
Hehe, I baked some cookies with the cooking team.

name: Yoshito
text:
There are some for everyone, so please take one.
I baked them very well.

When [Player] opened the small package of cookies,
they saw cookies with their face and Moritaka's face on them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right?
Moritaka cookies are a particularly wonderful creation—
That wasn't it?
Then what do you mean by cute...? Eh?

options.text: Just as I expected, a Moritaka...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, they're cute, aren't they?
Please savor each bite as you eat them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I wanted Master to be very happy—
Eh? You need mine, too...? I-I apologize...
I'll prepare some.

name: Hastur
text:
A cookie with my face on it, what is this!?
I do not look that unfriendly!

name: Tianzun
text:
No, it suits you perfectly.
Or rather, what's with this lecherous, happy face of mine!?

name: Hastur
text:
Hahahahaha, it's funny, isn't it?
You're the one it really resembles.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow, everyone's cookies are so cute!
Since we're here, let's all hold one and take a picture?

Saying that, everyone took a cookie and a picture.
Snegurochka looked at it happily.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe, I also have a present for you, [Player].
It's a pair of sunglasses just like mine, aren't you happy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No way? They're a pair, a pair!
Then Yoshito, you get a pair of necklaces like mine—

options.text: I'm happy! Do they suit me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Perfectly at that!
Then Yoshito, you get a pair of necklaces like mine—

options.text: The Santa outfit really suits you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, right~?
It makes me look 50% more dashing than usual, doesn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yoshito, would you like this really cool necklace that looks like mine, too?

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you for thinking of me.
B-But I've never really worn things like this before...

options.text: Wait, Snegurochka, are you staying behind?
Jack, you are under Frosty, not Santa?
Are you two staying with everyone?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, I am a Santa for the children
visiting this amusement park today!

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's right, Snegurochka.
I'm also... a member of Santa School, in a way.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Alright, everyone, let's go
deliver presents to the children!

Snegurochka, who was about to rush towards the children,
stopped and turned back with a shy smile.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, thank you so much for today.
No, not just today, but also for going to the amusement park with me.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you for the wonderful memories.
Everyone, I love all of you!

The companions looked at each other and smiled softly.
Then, they rushed towards Snegurochka.

name: Yoshito
text:
No, I have to thank you.
I also had a fun time with Master and everyone.

name: Hastur
text:
I... Hmph, I'm not one to say such things casually.
...But I don't dislike you all.

options.text: I had a lot of fun too.

text:
Snegurochka and the others headed happily towards the children.
One person silently watched their backs.

name: Tianzun
text:
What's wrong, Korpokkur?
You're a child, yet you look so tired.

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's nothing. Go on, hurry up.
You want to make the children happy, right?

name: Tianzun
text:
I want everyone to be happy.
Of course, you too.

name: Tianzun
text:
I've noticed it.
The unhappy aura coming from you, even more than Jack's.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...You're mistaken.
Even if you were right, telling me won't change anything.

name: Snegurochka
text:
You two, hurry up!
I'm going to finish distributing everything myself!

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm coming now!
I'm the one who's going to make the most children smile, so watch me!

Snegurochka and the others made the children
of the amusement park smile as Santas.

And so, Christmas and the Santa Departure Ceremony
came to a close in the best possible way—

options.text: It's like the video cut off...

name: Korpokkur
text:
That's all, just like every other time.
It was fun so far, wasn't it, [Player]?

options.text: Where? How many times has this happened!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
If you weren't so dense,
you should have figured it out by now.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Why is she so fixated
on this departure ceremony?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Being able to be both Santa and a reindeer...
What does she have to shoulder in exchange for such lawlessness?

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'll show you what happened ahead of time.
If you're prepared to regret it...!

And so, the days passed.
The 'bonds' woven at this time continued to grow.

[Player] deepened their bonds with
Snegurochka and the others.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Heh~ so this is the first shrine visit of the year!
You make wishes, like Santa, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
What should I wish for~?
Well, it's already decided.

name: Snegurochka
text:
May all the people
I love be happy forever.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Haha, then I'll make
that wish for you.

name: Yoshito
text:
You're always like that.
Sometimes, you should prioritize your own wishes.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, do you know what day it is today?
Geez, don't pretend you don't know, you all know it!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Today is Valentine's Day, Valentine's!
So, I made chocolate for everyone I love!

name: Tianzun
text:
Happy Valentine's from me too!
Of course, I wouldn't miss an event like this, would I?

name: Hastur
text:
I'm not familiar with the word 'Valentine,' but what a coincidence.
I also just happened to prepare chocolates.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, thank you.
That means Brother Hastur also loves us, right?

name: Hastur
text:
D-Don't say such things out loud, you fool!
That's not it, I'm an Old One, I'm not familiar with Tokyo's customs...

And so the days went by—
And the season—

options.text: I haven't heard from them lately.

name: Moritaka
text:
What's wrong, [Player]-dono? You seem to be lost in thought.
If you'd like, you can talk to me.

Moritaka, looking worried, spoke to [Player],
who was daydreaming in the after-school classroom.

options.text: No, I'm just a little lonely.
I haven't heard from Snegurochka lately.
We used to hang out together so often before.

name: Moritaka
text:
Hmm, perhaps she's busy with her talent work?
You know, the show Snegurochka-dono was in...

Just then, as if on cue,
[Player]'s phone received a message.

"It's been some time. It's Snegurochka. I've been feeling unwell recently.
I'm sorry I haven't been able to contact you lately."

"If you're free, I'd like to go to the amusement
park with everyone again. What are you all's plans?"

options.text: If you weren't feeling well, you should have told us~

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, it's been a while!
Sorry for making you all worry.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, this outfit brings back memories.
It reminds me of Christmas with everyone.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, even though you were bedridden, you could have at least contacted us.
I thought something had happened to you...

name: Yoshito
text:
Are you alright now?
What about your school work?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, I'm completely fine now!
So today, let's have the best time ever!!

name: Tianzun
text:
...That's right!
I have an attraction I want to ride today!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Then let's go where Uncle wants to go first!
I'm so excited to play with everyone again!

The place Tianzun wanted to go to was
the ice go-kart they raced before.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe! Actually, since then,
I've been coming here often and secretly practicing.

name: Tianzun
text:
Now, let's find out who's No. 1
among us once and for all!

name: Hastur
text:
You really had the gall to say that in front of Jack and Snegurochka?
Well, of course I'll come out on top, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
You can't forget about me, either!
If I get serious, I'm pretty good with sleds, you know?

And so, the battle for the second
Ice Sled Grand Prix began.

name: Tianzun
text:
The first race of the qualifiers is a must-see
Our two favorites, Hastur and Snegurochka, are already clashing!

name: Tianzun
text:
Even though it was a draw, there's a chance
this will be the de facto final match.

name: Yoshito
text:
Aren't you too excited...?
How much were you looking forward to this?

name: Hastur
text:
I will show no mercy, for I already knew that you
are a formidable opponent for this Hastur, the Lord of the Winds.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm ready for it, Brother Hastur!
I'll be disappointed if you don't give it your all today!

name: Tianzun
text:
Oh my, it looks like we're in for a good fight!
Get ready... go!

The two racers, full of enthusiasm, started off with great momentum.
However, the conclusion was reached surprisingly quickly.

Hastur gained a significant lead over
Snegurochka right from the start and won the race.

name: Hastur
text:
Fuhaha! You couldn't show your usual sharpness, could you?
It seems I am the winner this time!

However, Snegurochka kept her head down,
like she was holding back something, and wouldn't look up.

name: Hastur
text:
W-What's wrong, Snegurochka!?
Are you... crying?

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, it's not that. I was just so happy to be playing with
everyone again after so long that I teared up...

name: Hastur
text:
D-Don't make me panic.
I thought I made you cry...

name: Jack Frost
text:
It's alright, Snegurochka.
I'll get revenge for you.

name: Hastur
text:
Oh, you're quite the boaster.
It seems I need to show you your place once and for all.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hold on, you two.
I'm the one winning this time, alright?

The points from the first race were tallied,
and the top three advanced to the final round.

name: Tianzun
text:
Those guys are too strong, aren't they?
All my hard-earned practice...!

As Tianzun sulked a little,
Hastur and Jack were in a heated battle.

And just before the final corner, like in the race before,
Hastur's sled pulled slightly ahead.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Shit... Hastur's still fast, even though
he's not from a snowy country. At this rate...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack!
Do your best for my sake~!!

Jack nodded firmly at Snegurochka's cheer.
He leaned forward, putting all his energy into it.

name: Hastur
text:
I thought the match was decided, but you're unexpectedly good.
But, I'm not so kind as to hold back now.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm going to win for her!
Watch me, Snegurochka!!

Jack's sled, which was thought to have reached its top speed,
accelerated even more, definitely pulling ahead of Hastur's.

And with that, he crossed the finish line.
Jack Frost was the winner.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Phew... this time, Snegurochka,
your cheering got me through.

name: Snegurochka
text:
You did it!
As expected of you, Brother Jack!

name: Hastur
text:
Why, Snegurochka, are you cheering for Jack...?
Did you not want me to win?

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, it's because he cheered for me last time,
so it was my turn to cheer for him this time, I suppose?

name: Tianzun
text:
Wahaha, you two had a great game.
I won't lose next time!

name: Korpokkur
text:
...Geez, you're taking this amusement park attraction too seriously.
You're all like children, starting off too fast.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Alright, I won, so next,
won't you accompany me to the attraction I want to ride?

The group happily toured various parts of the amusement park.
Riding attractions, looking at souvenirs—

When they ran into children who remembered the departure ceremony,
they all acted like greeting characters and brought smiles to their faces.

And as they did so,
the closing time for the park drew near in the blink of an eye.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Hey, should we all ride the Ferris wheel one last time?
We've never all ridden it together, have we?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow, that's a wonderful idea! But the announcement for closing time has already played,
and all the attractions are stopped, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
What are you talking about? We have the ultimate authority of this
amusement park with us, so that shouldn't be a problem, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Geez... well, fine. Just for a little while.
The good kids have to go home now.

options.text: Next time, I want to play with everyone after closing!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You always say such outrageous things.
You want to make the children's paradise all ours?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a great idea, [Player]!
That sure~ sounds like a lot of fun, right?
Right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, I'll think about it.
If there's even a next time.

name: Hastur
text:
Then again, can we all ride it together?
It's an enclosed space, so I can wait outside...

name: Korpokkur
text:
What are you talking about now, it's fine.
It's safe even if six children of a large race ride it.

Slowly, the Ferris wheel began to rise.
A fantastical scene of the starry sky and illuminated amusement park spread out before their eyes.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Look, it's beautiful.
It really looks different from the Ferris wheel, doesn't it?

name: Hastur
text:
It feels nostalgic already, [Player].
The time when I outwitted the police with you on this Ferris wheel.

name: Yoshito
text:
I still have my doubts. Hastur, you just wanted to ride the Ferris
wheel with Master, so you hid your spatial leap ability.

name: Hastur
text:
That's not it, you fool!
I only rode it because Tianzun came up with a brilliant idea!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hahaha, truly,
this amusement park is filled with memories of everyone.

name: Snegurochka
text:
The plaza, right there, is where Brother Jack
and the big Moritaka-san had their match.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yoshito-san's marching band on Christmas day...
It was amazing, I can still hear it now.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, I'm glad I was able to put my skill in
manipulating automatons to good use. I never thought I would.

name: Yoshito
text:
If there's another opportunity,
I'll definitely use it as a foothold to spread the word about Moritaka.

When the gondola finally reached a height higher than the horizon,
snowflakes began to fall outside the window.

options.text: Snow at this time of year!?
Come to think of it, the temperature has been low for a while...

name: Snegurochka
text:
And Korpokkur-san's parade idea was amazing, too.
A lot of people really helped us for the departure ceremony.

name: Tianzun
text:
No, it's not that, Snegurochka.
It's all because you worked so hard.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Thank you. I want to see Uncle
lead the parade and be happy again.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, is that so?
I'll take you there anytime.

Outside the gondola, the unseasonal snow,
an abnormal weather phenomenon, began to fall harder—

name: Snegurochka
text:
And to you, Korpokkur-san, thank you
for bringing me to this amusement park that day.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thanks to your help,
I was able to meet so many people I love!

name: Korpokkur
text:
You're welcome, Snegurochka.
If you say so... yeah, I'm glad.

Soon, the gondola was nearing
the top of the Ferris wheel.

name: Snegurochka
text:
And [Player]-san, thanks to you, I've formed many 'bonds'
with many people and made many memories.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Every single one of them is irreplaceable to me.
Thank you so much, I love you.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm sorry for inviting you so suddenly today.
Because, I really, really wanted to come here with everyone again.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmm, why? You can come as many times as you want.
I thought it was just a children's game, but it seems I can still enjoy myself.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm sorry, I can't do that.
I came here today to tell everyone something.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I, Snegurochka,
will soon be gone from your sight.

Chapter 4:
Bye-bye, Snegurochka

name: Snegurochka
text:
I, Snegurochka,
will soon be gone from your sight.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I originally planned to leave without telling you the details...
Because saying goodbye would be painful.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But, I'm sorry.
At the end, I just wanted to be with everyone.

options.text: Wait, not all of a sudden...!
We won't just accept it as is!
Why didn't you say something sooner...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
It was decided for me from the very beginning.
Because "Snegurochka" is just that kind of existence.

name: Snegurochka
text:
An existence whose power wanes after Christmas Day,
and who disappears with the end of winter.

name: Yoshito
text:
That's why you haven't been feeling well lately...
Why, why...?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, I know it myself.
I know I could disappear at any time.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I knew saying goodbye this way
would only make everyone sad...!

In the show, the magical girl was confronting
a formidable enemy in a land filled with cherry blossoms.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's alright, I am—
A magical girl who makes wishes come true for someone!

Snegurochka twirled her wand,
and sparkling snow crystals began to glow around her.

name: Snegurochka
text:
To defeat the enemy, I must unleash the strongest magic I have now.
Snegurochka, focus all your magic on the wand!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I pray for the eternal ice fields, the blooming snowflakes, the frozen stars in the cold sky—
I pray! Zimniye Gryozy!

Snegurochka's most powerful, wide-area ice and snow magic hit the enemy.
Or so it should have been—

name: Snegurochka
text: Kyaaaaaaah!

name: Snegurochka
text:
N-No way...
My magic, it's not working...

Yes, it was spring.
Snegurochka's power was so weak it was almost gone—

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, I'm sorry...
I, think this is it for me...

The magical girl, Snegurochka, fell weakly.
The words 'magical girls are not forever' were now becoming a reality.

And the merciless dagger was about to reap the life of the innocent girl.
Next time, Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka, final episode—

name: Zhurong
text:
Eh!? Is it the final episode already!?
Why, why, it was my weekly fun...!

name: Quantum
text:
Well, there must be some reason.
It doesn't seem like it was cancelled... It is quite popular, right?

name: Quantum
text:
That's right... Snegurochka might also have things she's not good at...
And things that just can't be helped.

name: Zhurong
text:
No way~
I'm so sad...

As if a thought struck him,
Zhurong took out a pencil case from his bag and started writing something.

name: Quantum
text:
Zhurong...?
What are you doing?

name: Zhurong
text:
I'm writing a letter of protest.
I'm telling them not to end the show!

name: Quantum
text:
Well, that's not a bad idea.
Snegurochka said that feelings become power, right?

name: Quantum
text:
Zhurong, you're a big fan of the show.
I hope your feelings reach them.

Quantum, a little older than Zhurong, chose not to tell him
that some things just can't be helped by adult circumstances.

A morning in the Santa School classroom, a buzz of commotion was heard.
The topic of the conversation was Snegurochka.

name: Male Student
text:
The show's ending!?
Snegurochka-chan... as I thought...

name: Therian Student
text:
Hey, Jack-kun, do you know anything?
She's been absent from school lately...

name: Jack Frost
text:
No, I'm sorry, I don't know anything...
I'll let you know if I find out anything.

Jack, who was close to Snegurochka,
was naturally bombarded with questions.

After somehow getting through it,
Jack headed to a certain place after school.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm here, Snegurochka.
How are you feeling...?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack, you've worked hard.
Yes, I'm feeling much better today.

name: Snegurochka
text:
How was school? Everyone, are they doing well?
I want you to tell me about it... Hey, are you listening?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ah, sorry...
What was it again...?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez, you weren't listening!
I said I want you to tell me about school!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Oh, right. You asked me if there was
anything I wanted to do, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I thought of two things! One is that I want to go to the amusement park with everyone again!
And the other is—

Snegurochka was trying to be cheerful,
but it was clear that she was getting weaker day by day.

Jack turned his gaze downwards,
avoiding having to face that reality.

That scene, like a video, broke off for a moment
and then appeared once again with a change in time and place.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Principal Ded, do you know anything about Snegurochka?
She hasn't been coming to school at all lately.

Jack and [Player] barged into the principal's office,
but Ded, more surprised by Jack's words, looked down promptly.

name: Ded
text:
I see... Snegurochka,
she didn't tell you either.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You, just how much do you know!?
Even though I only met her occasionally, she always seemed unwell...!

name: Ded
text:
You're right, I... I think you should know.
So, I'll tell you a little about Snegurochka.

name: Ded
text:
I believe I have told you before,
that Snegurochka is an existence I created from snow.

name: Ded
text:
Yes, that is the reason.
The explanation for why Snegurochka's power has been continuously weakening lately.

name: Ded
text:
My power also wanes with the end of the Christmas miracle,
but for Snegurochka... that tendency is even stronger.

name: Ded
text:
I'll get straight to the point, so please listen calmly.
...Snegurochka, she will disappear as spring comes.

name: Ded
text:
Her lifespan is simply one winter.
In other words, she is designed to be a short-lived being.

After hearing that,
Jack grabbed Ded by the collar.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Why, did you have to keep something so important a secret!?
Aren't you like her father figure!?

name: Hastur
text:
...That's similar to what I have
always thought of lesser beings.

Saying that, Hastur, who was with [Player] and the others,
confessed the feelings he had kept hidden in his chest.

name: Hastur
text:
We, who live for thousands and tens of thousands of years,
pity humans who only live for a mere 80 years.

name: Hastur
text:
Imagine if you were to connect with a being who only lives for one season.
What would become of it?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Did Snegurochka really accept that?
It would have been fine if it were just me, hell, I thought it was just me!

name: Korpokkur
text:
That's enough, Jack. I know it myself.
I know you're also a 'species that can't survive the winter'.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Tokyo has been hot for you all lately.
Even if you can bear it now, you'll reach your limit soon.

name: Jack Frost
text:
K-Korpokkur...
You, what are you doing here?

name: Korpokkur
text:
She gave this to me, for you.
She told me that, if I transplant it to you, you can be saved.

It was Snegurochka's Sacred Artifact,
preserved in a container made of dark matter.

For Transients,
a Sacred Artifact is like a part of their own body.

When Jack Frost went to the hospital room where he was told to go,
Snegurochka was sitting weakly on the bed.

name: Jack Frost
text: Snegurochka... you.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack...
My Sacred Artifact, I'm giving it to you.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Snegurochka, why? Why...?
Why can't you live for yourself more!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Helping those Santas, or the fact that you
were a loner, none of that mattered, did it!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You had the least amount of time,
and most limited at that... So why...?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack, don't cry.
We were naturally just that kind of creature, weren't we? Besides...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Instead of using my time for myself,
after I was gone... I could only hope to live for someone else's dream.

Snegurochka gently patted Jack's head,
who was sobbing uncontrollably, in an attempt to comfort him.

Jack's cries did not stop,
until his face was swollen from tears.

When Jack finally calmed down and left
the hospital room to wash his face, Korpokkur was waiting for him.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm astonished. Why were you the one being comforted?
It should have been the other way around.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Hey, Korpokkur.
You know what to do, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Tell me. I don't care what happens to me.
I just wanted to save Snegurochka.

name: Korpokkur
text:
What, you think I haven't done anything so far?
Because, if I save her, her own wish dies instead.

Korpokkur began to explain.
The story of what had been happening all this time.

name: Korpokkur
text:
If Snegurochka's Sacred Artifact is transplanted,
Jack Frost will be saved.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Conversely, if Jack Frost's Sacred Artifact
is transplanted, Snegurochka will be saved.

But Snegurochka's heart would die.
Because then, she would be sacrificing Jack.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Only one of them can be saved.
We've been going round and round in this loop all this time.

Korpokkur told Jack, who was clutching his fists and wondering what this was all about,
with an expression that could be interpreted as both angry and sad.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Don't be so conceited.
You alone can't save Snegurochka.

name: Korpokkur
text:
So... I'll save her.
In my own selfish, old-fashioned way.

Everyone remembered.
This was 'a scene that had actually happened in the past'.

The group was speechless at the overwhelming turn of events.
The air was heavy and cold, and they didn't know what to say.

[Player] and the others checked their surroundings and their own
clothes to confirm the boundary with the 'memories of the past'.

It was indeed the Magical Snowland. After the Santa Departure Ceremony
was over, and the children from the cooperating schools had been sent off—
That's what was supposed to have happened.

Suddenly, a storm of artificial snow, accompanied by an aurora,
appeared, completely surrounding Magical Snowland.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow, it's amazing... This aurora,
is much more beautiful than the one we saw during the parade...

name: Tianzun
text:
No, what is this?
This is surely an abnormal weather phenomenon in Tokyo...

In the otherworld Penglai, auroras were a sign of bad luck,
so Tianzun instinctively braced himself against the light.

At that moment, Yoshito looked towards the
entrance of Magical Snowland, shockingly.

name: Yoshito
text:
Ah, Master...!
Outside... Please take a look outside!

The entrance, emergency exits, and all paths leading out of the park were,
before their eyes, buried in a massive amount of snow.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Now, it's sealed off by artificial snow.
We will make this a new paradise, with an eternal winter.

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's alright, Snegurochka.
In this amusement park, you may live for an eternity.

It was always this way, even back in my hometown.
I was the one who was meant to reset civilization.

When civilization progresses too far, humans end up destroying themselves.
So I was the one who was supposed to close it off.

To keep Kamuy Kotan and human civilization
forever as children.

I was the only one who had to get my hands dirty.
It was enough for you all to remain as children and be happy.

But among them, there was one person who, despite being a child,
got their hands dirty for the future of everyone else.

Ah, Ainurakkur.
My adorable human, the small hero of Kamuy Kotan.

Children are supposed to be happy.
But you always deny what I believe in.

But I do think this. Ainurakkur, frankly speaking, is not
a well-behaved hero like those from other worlds.

His actions are always so childish.
And he denies my, this Korpokkur's image of a child.

But still, I truly... loved that guy
who was always acting so childish.

And now,
in Magical Snowland.

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's alright, Snegurochka.
In this amusement park, you may live for an eternity.

name: Korpokkur
text:
With me as the core, I will turn this place into an otherworld.
A world of eternal winter where snow never melts.

name: Korpokkur
text:
You and [Player],
I'll just lock you up in this amusement park and never let you go.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Of course, [Player].
My purpose in the first place for coming to Tokyo was you.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Securing you and saving Snegurochka together.
This is my last and greatest plan.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I tried everything I could think of.
So... this is the only way.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'll also lock up the others so you don't get bored.
Consider it a bonus.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Korpokkur-san, why are you doing this...?
No, if things go this way, [Player]-san and the others won't have a spring!

For Snegurochka, the world not having spring was unacceptable.
She swore on the name of her mother, the spirit of spring, Vesna Krasna.

This was the value system of the otherworld Kitezh.
She couldn't possibly deny the desire for spring.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I don't understand. Korpokkur-san, your amusement park was supposed
to be a place making many children smile, wasn't it?

name: Korpokkur
text:
You don't need to worry about that, Snegurochka.
I simply wished for a paradise for as many children as possible.

name: Korpokkur
text:
However, at that time, I made a sacrifice.
That's why— I'm here in Tokyo now.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Even now, I don't think I was wrong, but...
If you ask me if I regret it, I'd be lying if I said I didn't.

name: Korpokkur
text:
So, just give in, Snegurochka.
...Jack, you know what to do.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Alright, Korpokkur.
I'll cooperate with you.

Saying that, Jack Frost
stood on Korpokkur's side.

name: Snegurochka
text: Brother Jack!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You know it yourself, Snegurochka!
You, won't you just disappear if this keeps on going?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Are you, saying you're fine to just disappear?
I, myself, can't accept that...

name: Snegurochka
text:
I wouldn't like it either!
Brother, if you were to disappear...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Stop it! Otherwise... I'll really...
...Start to hate you.

Jack's face showed a hint of hurt,
but it quickly turned into an angry, sulky expression.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Who really cares, if I'm already the disliked Jack Frost?
I was born under one of those stars, so I'm used to being alone.

A blizzard, as if nature itself was angry, began to blow,
and the entire area turned into a whiteout.

Korpokkur and Jack Frost
turned their backs and left.

name: Tianzun
text:
...Well, for the time being,
shall we think about it while riding an attraction?

name: Hastur
text:
Why would we do that!? Dear mister Happy-brained Hermit,
don't you understand the situation!?

name: Tianzun
text:
It's too cold outside for an old man like me!
...And it's not a crime to talk to Snegurochka for a little while, is it?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Why... Brother Jack,
when you've finally managed to make friends at Santa School...

name: Yoshito
text:
Having to weight your life and his, and having to make a decision,
I feel like... I understand his feelings.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master, I apologize. If I have to be honest,
I can understand Jack's feelings so well that it hurts.

name: Yoshito
text:
If I were in the same situation with you and Moritaka,
I am confident that I would make the same choice without hesitation.

name: Yoshito
text:
Even if it means getting my hands dirty with someone else's blood...
I would wish for someone to live.

name: Hastur
text:
I also know well that loneliness can drive a person mad.
If our presence can comfort your loneliness—

name: Snegurochka
text: Stop it!!

At that moment, Snegurochka let out
a loud scream that she had never made before.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I appreciate your sentiment.
However, this is absolutely wrong!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Even if Korpokkur-san and I are fine,
everyone else here will surely—

name: Tianzun
text:
Snegurochka, are you really okay with that?
You can still wish to stay here.

name: Tianzun
text:
If you do, Jack and Korpokkur
will surely cooperate with you.

At Tianzun's words, however,
Snegurochka shook her head.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, I'll be alright. Please, everyone.
Help me stop Brother Jack and Korpokkur!

Just like in the past loop they saw earlier,
either Snegurochka or Jack would disappear.

But if they sided with Korpokkur,
[Player] and the others would be trapped in eternal winter.

Nevertheless, everyone headed towards the Ice Castle,
where Korpokkur and Jack had disappeared to.

The two were waiting in a room made of ice,
as if they were the rulers of this world.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You don't seem to have changed your mind.
Why are you doing this, Snegurochka?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Korpokkur-san, Brother Jack...
I appreciate your feelings, but this is still wrong.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Even if you think so now, if you keep playing
in this amusement park, you'll surely start to have fun.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No... Please send everyone back.
This isn't what I wanted.

Snegurochka held up her wand.
Seeing that, Jack snorted.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Alright, Snegurochka.
Let's have a sibling fight, shall we?

name: Jack Frost
text:
The talent you inherited from Ded-sensei is certainly amazing,
but I'll show you that you can't beat me.

name: Yoshito
text:
Do you think you can win with such a difference in numbers?
Even if you have the home advantage, there's only a one in ten thousand chance—

Jack shook his spray can,
and sprayed it everywhere by pressing the nozzle.

Then, ice sculptures of Snegurochka, who looked exactly
like her, were instantly created on the ground.

name: Jack Frost
text:
The mischievous trick of the disliked Jack Frost,
and the frozen graffiti that he leaves on the world—

name: Jack Frost
text:
If I put my all into it, I can even make ice sculptures that move.
...This is, my Sacred Artifact.

Snegurochka looked at her own fake self with a surprised expression,
only to smile happily.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Honestly... Thank you for making them look just like me, Brother Jack.
And, for watching after me so carefully.

name: Yoshito
text:
The level of realism is amazing,
it rivals my understanding of Moritaka!

name: Jack Frost
text:
We're about to fight,
so stop with the embarrassing analysis!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, I'm happy. You're your usual self now,
because I would hate it if we have to end things awkwardly.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...I said I won't let this be the end.
Korpokkur, I'll provide support with my graffiti.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Alright, I understand.
The true power of a 'World Representative', I'll show it to you.

Hastur launched a preemptive strike with
his tentacles to restrain Korpokkur and Jack, but—

He paused when he saw the expressions on
the faces of the ice sculptures created by Jack's graffiti.

name: Hastur
text:
Guh!?
Oh, y-you think you're so clever...!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Did you see that, Hastur?
The soul I poured into my graffiti is as real as it gets!

name: Tianzun
text:
Isn't that cowardly, Jack?
You knew that we would hesitate...!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Say whatever you want. Snegurochka's life is on the line,
so I'll do anything it takes.

name: Jack Frost
text:
After all, that's the point of defeating me, right?
You finally get to choose a future for Snegurochka.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You wouldn't say you can't attack now, would you?
You didn't come here without being prepared, did you!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Stop it!
It's wrong to lock other people's futures away for my sake!!

Snegurochka's words cut deep into the hearts of those who stood against her.
Jack's face showed that he couldn't bear the pain.

And it wasn't just Jack.
Hastur, Tianzun, everyone was in pain.

name: Jack Frost
text:
But everyone else doesn't seem to think that way.
In that case, isn't it fine to stay like this?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, we're, friends, right?
...So please.

options.text: (Point your sword at the ice sculptures)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's right, I don't wish for everyone to be sacrificed for my sake!
Snegurochka scratched her snow-covered pact and transformed into a magical girl.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry, [Player]-san, for having to give you a painful role...
But please, just for a little longer, lend me your strength!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, this is still wrong.
I don't want everyone to be sacrificed for my sake!
Snegurochka scratched her snow-covered pact and transformed into a magical girl.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry, everyone, for making you make this painful choice.
But please, just for a little longer, lend me your strength!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, [Player]?
I thought you would understand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, [Player]-san!
I don't want everyone to be sacrificed for my sake!
Snegurochka scratched her snow-covered pact and transformed into a magical girl.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry, everyone, for making you make this painful choice.
But please, lend me your strength!

text: Battle Start

I, who have the lifespan of a star, love humans.
You fleeting beings who can't even live for 100 years.

I, who rule over fever and plague, thought your fragile lives,
which could be blown away with a single breath, were beautiful.

So when I saw you in this Tokyo, in a human form—
At first, I thought it was a hideous nightmare.

■■■■■■■■■■■.
My sibling, with a name that cannot be spoken.

In my opinion, you are...
More tenacious than any of us siblings.

We all know that when Azathoth's fleeting dream ends,
the universe will disappear.

But you are the only one who would
'live beyond the dream'.

Sure, I'll say it again.
I know just how tenacious you can be.

No matter how many times I kill you or bury you at the bottom of the sea—
You will always be resurrected and stand up again.

Korpokkur knows it himself.
This turn of events is, in fact, the second time it has happened.

That's why his hand hesitated for a moment.
Because he knew of the tragedy that would follow.

He remembered the previous loop.
It was after the new year, when spring was approaching.

They still couldn't find a way to save both of them,
and this was the first time they had trapped everyone in Magical Snowland.

Everyone was struggling to fight against
Jack's ice sculptures and were forced into a difficult battle.

But amidst it all, Snegurochka alone,
continued to fight with all her might. And then—

name: Jack Frost
text:
Damn it... Snegurochka.
Why are you doing this...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm so sorry, Brother Jack.
The things you did for my sake, thank you very much.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Pray...
Zimniye Gryozy!!

Her 'Rule' covered the surroundings with a snowy glaze.
Ice particles pushed back Jack's ice sculptures.

Jack, struck by the snowy blizzard, fell to the ground,
his face covered by his arm, and he didn't move.

His shoulders trembled slightly,
and quiet sobs could be heard.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother... did you know?
I was truly happy to have met everyone.

name: Snegurochka
text:
How's everyone else doing?
I hope I've become an important memory for you all too.

name: Snegurochka
text:
So, I want to say goodbye with a smile at the end.
So that the days we spent together won't be sad.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Of course, you might be sad for a while.
But I want you all to get through it, because I want you to be smiling.

Snegurochka held back her tears
and showed a crumpled smile.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I can't smile, Snegurochka.
Not if you're not here...! Everyone else won't either...

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, don't say such spoiled things.
This is my last wish for everyone.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Even if I'm not here, I want everyone to welcome the new semester,
go cherry blossom viewing, and go to the pool in the summer—

name: Snegurochka
text:
You have to live my share of life and be happy,
otherwise I'll never forgive you!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Oh, and Brother, promise me one more thing.
When you go back to school, I want you to make a work of art for me.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That way, a lot of people will remember me, right?
Like a proof that I was able to be with everyone.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Brother, can you promise me?
I don't want you to break it, alright?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I refuse! I won't make such a promise!
I want to be with you forever—

name: Jack Frost
text: Sne... gu... rochka??

name: Everyone
text: Snegurochkaaaaaaah!!

That was what happened in the previous loop.
A beautiful tragedy that could happen anywhere.

Believing the same thing would happen again, Korpokkur's hand faltered.
And a gap was created.

note: I know this was supposed to be an emotional moment but I couldn't stop laughing when I saw the options

options.text: (Get angry while crying with a runny nose)

text:
At [Player]'s actions,
everyone stopped moving.

options.text: I don't want anyone to disappear!!
Couldn't you have tried more things, you tenacious coward!?

text:
Breaking the floor made of ice and getting covered in mud,
[Player] screamed.

name: Yoshito
text:
Master... guh.
A mess, your face is a mess, ahahaha.

Getting dirtied alongside his master,
Yoshito couldn't help but laugh.

name: Tianzun
text:
Wahahahaha! What a tenaciousness,
like a villain who refuses to accept defeat!?

With an expression like a villain,
Tianzun couldn't help but laugh.

name: Korpokkur
text:
No... I told you earlier.
I tried everything I could think of—

options.text: You should have asked us sooner!
You could have asked for help from others, right?
Anyway, are you just accepting defeat!?

name: Hastur
text:
Ku... Kuhaha!?
You truly are the worst, my sibling!!

name: Korpokkur
text:
...Don't be so unreasonable.
Because I am— the 'World Representative'.

Among many rival players,
Korpokkur's actions were limited to monopolizing [Player].

Therefore, he couldn't ask for cooperation.
And he couldn't miss the opportunity to get the prize.

Korpokkur knew.
They were perpetually constrained.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...That's why I admired you.
You're truly— the guy who's always like a child.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I knew you would do this.
...I've always known.
